local outr_cmd = {}
-- adding base comms for _, v in pairs(base_comms) do forge.comms[v[2]] = forge.comms[v[2]] + v[1] end
if descriptor1 ~= nil then desc_comms = forge.descriptor[descriptor1] or {}
--add desc multiplier comms for _, v in pairs(desc_comms) do local amt = v[1]*size
forge.comms[v[2]] = forge.comms[v[2]] + amt end end

forge.comms[v[2]] = forge.comms[v[2]] + amt end end
end }
